categories: Category:Events of the Great Galactic War

nodes.text: At some point between 3681 and 3653 BBY, during the Great Galactic War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic, the Twi'lek slave Leontyne Saresh led her fellow slaves in a revolt against the Empire's forces on the planet Edusa. As a result of the revolt, many slaves were freed, and Saresh went on to become a staunch opponent of the Empire and slavery in the Galactic Senate.
The revolt on Edusa was first mentioned in Leontyne Saresh's bio entry in the 2012 reference guide Star Wars: The Old Republic Encyclopedia.
